title: Nansen Slashes 30% of Headcount in Bid to Cut Costs
description: The company said it has multiple years of runway ahead, despite the need to now reduce expenses.

title: Tech giants’ and Bitcoin’s dominance skew S&P 500, crypto market growth rates
description:
As the S&P 500 index boasts a considerable YTD growth, its true market conditions are masked by the disproportionate influence of tech giants. Similarly, the crypto market is dominated by Bitcoin, overshadowing the performance of other cryptocurrencies. But when we exclude these dominant players, what surprising parallels emerge between the S&P 500 and the crypto market? And how does this comparison shed light on the diversity and resilience of these markets? Discover the answers and implications for market watchers and participants...

The post Tech giants’ and Bitcoin’s dominance skew S&P 500, crypto market growth rates appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: XRP network sees address activity spike, token rallies
description: The XRP Network has experienced two significant spikes in address activity, marking the second and third-largest surges of all time, according to data from Santiment.

title: Deribit ETH perpetual futures open interest hits new 3 year high
description: Ethereum (ETH) has recently achieved a milestone in the derivatives market as the open interest for its perpetual futures contracts on Deribit surged to a three-year high of $544,931,613.

title: MetaZone Secures Funding To Expand the World’s First Tokenized App Platform for the Metaverse
description:
May 30, 2023 – Singapore, Singapore MetaZone announced today the completion of its $3 million seed round co-led by metaverse industry leaders Sfermion and CMT Digital to expand their tokenized app platform pioneering the META (Metaverse Enabled Tokenized Application). Top Web 3.0 funds Tess Ventures, IOSG Ventures, IVC (Infinity Ventures Crypto), Polygon Studios, MHC Digital and […]

The post MetaZone Secures Funding To Expand the World’s First Tokenized App Platform for the Metaverse appeared first on The Daily Hodl.

title: Trader Who Accurately Called 2023 Crypto Rally Predicts Massive Litecoin (LTC) Surge – Here’s His Forecast
description:

title: The QWAN Launch – A Token for the Global Gaming Industry
description:
